Translations.Text: Tag ven when vi seg kred hom women their lights radiating ahead da them al their tuj. Bon news est yours ke tag vi hav gxarden flu streams Vi abide therein forever This est great triumf
Tag hypocrite hom women dir al those kred Placx allow us sorb kelk da your light Gxi dir Ir dors behind vi streb light barrier set them gate separates mercy inner flank retribution outer flank
Ili vok them Est ni ne vi? Ili respond Jes vi cheated your anim hezit dub igx misled wishful opini di judgment ven! Vi diverted el DI iluzi
Do hodiaux ne ransom pren vi nor el those disbelieved Your abode est fajr; gxi est your lord miserable abode
Gxi est temp those kred open up their kor di message truth revealed herein Ili ne est followers previous scriptures kor igx hard temp consequently many da them torn wicked
Kon ti DI revives land gxi mort! Ni tiel eksplik revelations vi vi kompren
Surely charitable hom women prunt DI prunt goodness. Ili ricev their rekompenc multiplied manifold ili ind generous recompense
